WorkItem.Description:
When I optimize, the optimizer is returning a result with 15.02% hit chance, 1.98% off hit cap. I understand values around .5%, but 2% off cap seems far too great to honestly be the best set up.
Could this issue be caused by having a 'best' gearset with which it is impossible to attain hit cap, so the optimizer is ignoring it and going for socket bonuses and other stats to try to make up for the gap?
Â 
I have attached my character file, thank you for your time :)
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] After Optimizer, hit chance very low

Comments.Message: Your character file has no glyphs selected. After I did that, the optimiser recommended dropping down to 13.91% hit :)

2% off cap is in no sense too great to be best setup. The reason is quite simply that int is a lot better than hit, so if your highest ilevel pieces don't hit on them it's often optimal to not be hit capped.

Wisk, thank you for pointing that out, I had glyphs selected before I downloaded the new version of Rawr, must have unselected them! :P
Thanks Kavan for your insight, it feels so... wrong to not be hit capped, it's kinda been drilled into us hey, but you've never steered me wrong :) Thanks for the quick response!
